title: Xiaohan Liu
text:
I am a first-year Biostatistics PhD student at the University of Pennsylvania broadly interested in topics under causal inference and survival analysis.
Before joining the PhD program, I obtained my BS in Statistics and Data Science from Carnegie Mellon University.
For chats about research ideas, potential collaborations, music, or books, feel free to reach out at liuxh[at]upenn[dot]edu!


Education

PhD in Biostatistics
The University of Pennsylvania, TBD
BS in Statistics and Data Science (Mathematical Sciences Track)
Carnegie Mellon University, May 2024

title: Music
text:
I played flute in my middle school band, high school marching band, wind ensmeble, full orchestra, TMEA Region Band, Orchestra, and All-State Band.
At CMU, I was lucky to continue playing as part of the All-University Orchestra.
